glossentry.glossdef: The Program Flow Trace (PFT) architecture assumes that any trace decompressor has a copy of the program being traced, and generally outputs only enough trace for the decompressor to reconstruct the program flow. However, its trace output also enables a decompressor to reconstruct the program flow when it does not have a copy of parts of the program, for example because the program uses self-modifying code.A Program Flow Trace Macrocell (PTM) implements the Program Flow Trace architecture.
